fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Kill a player (Alive)
- Ambush a player's visitors (Dead)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may use your first ability while alive, and the second while dead
- You see any players visiting your target the following night
- You will see any roles visiting your target while dead
- After successfully killing a player while you are dead, you must take a night to prepare another ambush
